ANNEXURE-A
1. Introduction
Unmanned Aircraft (UA) or Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS),commonly
known as "Drone" is considered to be a game-changer technology in modem life.
Drones are being extensively used for various applications. However, drones may also
be used for destnrctive purposcs such as delivering explosives and harmful cargo for
crcating havoc etc.
Drones also have the potential for disrupting manned aircraft movements especially in
the proximiiy to airports. There are numerous examples of hours-long hold up of
airport operations due drone sightings like Gatwick and Dubai airports' Such incidents
have led the aviation community and security agencies io consider the deployment of
counter-drone systems by airport opelators to protect airports and their proximities to
protect the airports from rogue drones
2. System Description
The Counler Drone System should provide Multi Sensor based complete and
comprehensive solution with regards to drotre detection, tracking, identification and
neutralization (Soft Kilts and Hard kill options). Soft-kill options rvill not work if the
unmanned aircraft employs navigation tlrough INS or VPS and is not remotely
piloted i.e. fully autonomous. I:lence the neutralization by hard kill measures such as
laser, and Fire Control locking system is inevitable. The decision to employ' such hard
kill measures shall be depending on the si(uations and specific to the airport as per
SOP. The hard kill option will be the last resort for drone neutralization. If the hard
kitl option is decided then, the laser will be the first hard kill option for drone
neutralization
The solution should integrare detection, identification and engagement sub-systems
and provide operator with a composite air situational picture as well as tools for
managing response.
The salient features of Counter Drone system are given belorv
The Counter UAV solution should be effective and efficient in all-rvcather
conditions with minimum of 95% detection and neutralization probability of all
drones with or without RF command and conkol and data link.
The C-UAS solution should simultaneously detect, identifu and neutralize
multiple / swarm of drones (minimum 20 Nos).
Operation of the counter drone solution in no case should interfere with RF
environment of Airport operations.
